message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $150. I believe it offers excellent value at this price point. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $80 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $130. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $130 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $110. I'm hoping we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
